column2: SELECT   p.ra,   p.dec,   z.z,   z.zErr,   p.petroMag_r  FROM PhotoObj p     JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq(#,#,#) n ON n.objID = p.objID   JOIN Photoz z ON z.objID = n.objID  WHERE   p.type = #   AND z.z < # + #*z.zErr   AND z.z > # - #*z.zErr   AND z.zErr < # */    DECLARE @cnt INT = #;  WHILE @cnt <= # BEGIN   DECLARE @ra1 FLOAT= SELECT ra FROM mydb.sample_targets4 WHERE idx_num = @cnt        SELECT     p.ra,     p.dec,     z.z,     z.zErr,     p.petroMag_r        FROM PhotoObj p     JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq(ra1,mydb.sample_targets4.dec,mydb.sample_targets4.theta) n ON n.objID = p.objID   JOIN Photoz z ON z.objID = n.objID    WHERE     p.type = #     AND z.z < mydb.sample_targets4.z + #*z.zErr     AND z.z > mydb.sample_targets4.z - #*z.zErr     AND z.zErr < #   SET @cnt = @cnt + #; END;
